messages.original:
Last night, Russian Kh-101 cruise missiles and Geran-2 drones struck the "Concern Electron" plant in Lviv City. The full extent of the damage is unknown. 
This plant was previously targeted on July 12, 2025.
Coordinates: 49.842332, 24.002155
Edit: I'm aware the geolocation proof is wrong. The coordinates are correct though.

Last night, 3-4 Russian Kh-101 cruise missiles impacted the Motor Sich Plant in Zaporizhzhia City. 
Locals report that Building 113 was the main target, which was used for producing engines for aircraft, drones and other light aviation. A large fire broke out afterwards.

Russian forces have captured the village of Bezsalivka, Bilopillya direction, Sumy Oblast. 
Pre-war population: ~60.
Total land area: ~0.62km¬≤.

Russian forces have captured the town of Shcherbynivka, Kostyantynivka direction, Donetsk Oblast.
Pre-war population: ~3,266.
Total land area: ~5.92km¬≤.

Ukrainian forces have re-established control over the village of Andriivka-Klevtsove, Prosyana direction, Donetsk Oblast.
Pre-war population: ~777.
Total land area: ~3.66km¬≤.

Russian forces have captured the village of Novoheorhiivka, Pokrovske Direction, Dnipropetrovsk Oblast.
Pre-war population: ~34.
Total land area: ~0.25km¬≤

If you currently live in Ukraine or Russia and feel comfortable with getting in contact with me, please DM me. I‚Äôm looking to increase the scope of my sourcing and reliability of the information I provide, especially on Russian and Ukrainian attacks. 
You will remain anonymous, and in complete control of the information you choose to provide, and how you provide it. I will only publish information that you allow me to, and that doesn‚Äôt put anyone from any side at risk. This will be extremely beneficial to my reporting.

Russian forces have captured the village of Maliivka, Pokrovske Direction, Dnipropetrovsk Oblast.
Pre-war population: ~163.
Total land area: ~1.27km¬≤.

Some general updates that I think are important to mention:
Kucheriv Yar (Dobropillya direction) remains under Russian control and has been used for new advances in multiple directions. The newest attacks have been taking place to the rear of the stronghold village of Shakhove, which Russia is trying to cut off by reaching Toretske. A strong push is also being made from Poltavka.
As for the Russian soldiers who were encircled last week, I wanted to wait a little to confirm this, but roughly 20 POWs were taken, around 15 of which surrendered near the small road north of Zolotyi Kolodyaz. The other ~5 were caught in the forests to the southeast. Everyone else was either killed or managed to escape back to the Kucheriv Yar area.
Russia has now regained the initiative in the Dobropillya direction and is making significant progress. I will post more on that later, though.

In the Bilopillya direction, Russian forces resumed their assault operations and managed to complete the capture of Bezsalivka.
After weeks of positional battles, with Ukraine holding no permanent presence in the village, Russian forces began attacking towards the western houses, which were subsequently captured. They were also able to improve their positions in the forested area to the north and secured another section of the forests along the international border.
+ ~1.13km¬≤ in favour of Russia.

Israeli defence Minister Israel Katz stated that the Knesset has approved the IDF ground operation aimed at occupying all of Gaza City. 
He stated that this operation will take place through "heavy fire, civilian evacuation, and ground maneuver," and threatened to flatten the city if Hamas doesn't accept Israel's terms, including freeing all hostages and completely disarming.
Our boy is out here doing side quests...
Our boy is out here doing side quests...

I thought it was AI generated at first 
ü§£

Major attack on Slovyansk and Kramatorsk, Donetsk Oblast just now. 
At least two Iskander-M ballistic missiles, several KAB glide-bombs and as many as 10 Geran-2 drones hit the cities, with Kramatorsk appearing to have taken the main hit. 
More KABs are flying in their direction.

Major attack on Slovyansk and Kramatorsk, Donetsk Oblast just now. 
At least two Iskander-M ballistic missiles, several KAB glide-bombs and as many as 10 Geran-2 drones hit the cities, with Kramatorsk appearing to have taken the main hit. 
More KABs are flying in their direction.
A UAV launched by the Houthis in Yemen was intercepted by the Israeli Airforce after it flew over the Egyptian border towards the Gaza envelope. Sirens sounded in multiple Israeli settlements.

Another drone from Yemen flew in from the southwest and began flying parallel with the Gaza border. Multiple interceptors were used, all of which failed to intercept it, reportedly resulting in fighter jets being scrambled. A helicopter was eventually able to shoot it down.  
As for the reports on supposed rocket launches from the Gaza Strip coinciding with the drone flight, I haven‚Äôt seen any information to suggest this actually occurred yet.
